# Cloud Computing

Cloud Computing will allow you to use resources external to your computer/device to run OpenSees simulations. The simulations are run on compute resources remote from you. The interaction with the remote resources is done over the internet, the 'cloud. Basically the internet is used to transfer your data to remote processors, the applications process the data on the remote processors, and you obtain the processed data when done again over the internet.

  • OpenSees and Amazon EC2

OpenSees on NEEShub
